keyMoments.moment: First appearance alongside his twin brother Kotori, arriving to avenge their brother Satori's defeat
keyMoments.significance: Debut as new antagonists in the Skypiea Arc

keyMoments.moment: Left by Enel to fight Nami and Gan Fall on the Going Merry
keyMoments.significance: Sets up upcoming battle with the Straw Hats

abilities.name: Mantra (Observation Haki)
abilities.description: Ability to predict what enemies are planning before they do it

abilities.name: Axe Dial
abilities.description: Dial weapon that releases cutting attacks

abilities.name: Flame Dial
abilities.description: Dial weapon that releases fire attacks

relationships.description: Hotori is the younger brother of Satori and seeks revenge for his defeat
Hotori and Kotori are identical twin brothers who work together
Hotori serves as a lieutenant under Commander Yama

physicalDescription: Identical twin with spherical body, white jumpsuit with orange accents, goat-like nose, ears, and horns, Birkan wings. Height: 179 cm.

reveals.reveal: Debut as Satori's younger brother and member of God's Army

keyMoments.moment: First appearance alongside his twin brother Hotori, arriving to avenge their brother Satori's defeat
keyMoments.significance: Debut as new antagonists in the Skypiea Arc

keyMoments.moment: Left by Enel to fight Nami and Gan Fall on the Going Merry
keyMoments.significance: Sets up upcoming battle with the Straw Hats

abilities.name: Mantra (Observation Haki)
abilities.description: Ability to predict what enemies are planning before they do it

abilities.name: Impact Dial
abilities.description: Dial weapon that releases impact force attacks

abilities.name: Flavor Dial
abilities.description: Dial weapon containing stored farts for offensive purposes

relationships.description: Kotori is the younger brother of Satori and seeks revenge for his defeat
Kotori and Hotori are identical twin brothers who work together
Kotori serves as a lieutenant under Commander Yama

physicalDescription: Identical twin with spherical body, white jumpsuit with orange accents, goat-like nose, ears, and horns, Birkan wings. Height: 179 cm.

reveals.reveal: Debut as Satori's younger brother and member of God's Army

keyMoments.moment: Battles Wyper and declares that cannons and rifles won't work on his rubber body
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates confidence in his Devil Fruit immunity

keyMoments.moment: Nearly incinerated by Wyper's Burn Bazooka fire attack
keyMoments.significance: Shows vulnerability to fire-based attacks despite rubber immunity

keyMoments.moment: Exchanges simultaneous bazooka attacks with Wyper
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates equal combat prowess with the War Demon

keyMoments.moment: Swallowed by giant python and falls into underground ruins
keyMoments.significance: Sets up discovery of ancient Shandora secrets

keyMoments.moment: Upgrades his weapon with Flame Dial to create the Burn Bazooka
keyMoments.significance: Reveals tactical adaptation and dangerous new weapon

keyMoments.moment: Decides not to kill Luffy to save energy for fighting Enel
keyMoments.significance: Reveals true priorities and hatred for Enel over other enemies

reveals.reveal: Wyper's primary goal is to kill Enel, not the Straw Hats or other pirates

abilities.name: Burn Bazooka
abilities.description: Enhanced bazooka weapon created by adding a Flame Dial, producing white flames that can harm even rubber bodies

keyMoments.moment: Appears on the Going Merry and confronts the crew
keyMoments.significance: First direct confrontation with Straw Hat crew members

keyMoments.moment: Reveals his true goal is to find and claim the City of Gold
keyMoments.significance: Establishes primary motivation and creates three-way conflict

keyMoments.moment: Instantly defeats Sanji with a single electrical attack
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates overwhelming power against strong opponents

keyMoments.moment: Electrocutes and defeats Usopp with Goro Goro no Mi
keyMoments.significance: Shows merciless nature and god-like power

reveals.reveal: Enel's ultimate objective is the legendary City of Gold, Shandora

keyMoments.moment: Claims to have 8,000 followers to intimidate Enel
keyMoments.significance: Callback to recurring lie that later becomes truth

keyMoments.moment: Defeated by Enel's electrical attack, appearing dead
keyMoments.significance: Creates moment of extreme tension and danger

keyMoments.moment: Mistakenly checks wrong side of Sanji's chest for heartbeat
keyMoments.significance: Comic relief showing panic-induced mistakes

keyMoments.moment: Instantly defeated by Enel before mounting any defense
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Enel as overwhelming threat to the crew

keyMoments.moment: Corrects Usopp about heart location, confirming Sanji is alive
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial information and comic relief

keyMoments.moment: Prepares to battle Hotori and Kotori with Gan Fall
keyMoments.significance: Shows courage in face of powerful enemies

keyMoments.moment: Battles Genbo, demonstrating surprising agility despite large size
keyMoments.significance: Establishes combat capabilities and threat level

keyMoments.moment: Defeats Genbo with Ten-Fold Axe: Axe Mountain technique
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates mastery of Dial weaponry

abilities.name: Ten-Fold Axe: Axe Mountain
abilities.description: Uses a sash with ten Axe Dials sewn onto it to augment belly drop with cutting damage, leaving X-shaped marks

keyMoments.moment: Confronts Yama with cannonball attacks showing determination
keyMoments.significance: Represents Shandia warrior spirit

keyMoments.moment: Defeated by Yama's Axe Mountain technique
keyMoments.significance: Shows the power gap between Divine Soldiers and regular Shandia

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.moment: Encounters Gedatsu, who struggles to see him due to rolled-back eyes
keyMoments.significance: Sets up comedic battle for next episode

keyMoments.moment: Witnesses Enel's overwhelming power against the crew
keyMoments.significance: Reinforces understanding of Enel's threat level

keyMoments.moment: Prepares to battle Hotori and Kotori with Nami
keyMoments.significance: Shows continued alliance with Straw Hats

keyMoments.moment: Encounters Chopper but struggles to locate him due to eyes being rolled back
keyMoments.significance: Introduces comedic incompetence despite dangerous priest status
